text: The neighborhood with the highest median price is {value}.
query:
SELECT n.neighborhood 
FROM (SELECT neighborhood_id, AVG(price) as median_price 
      FROM (SELECT neighborhood_id, price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY neighborhood_id ORDER BY price) as rn, 
            COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY neighborhood_id) as cnt 
            FROM ListingsCore) 
      WHERE rn in (cnt/2, cnt/2 + 1, (cnt+1)/2) 
      GROUP BY neighborhood_id) as medians 
JOIN Neighborhoods n ON medians.neighborhood_id = n.neighborhood_id 
ORDER BY median_price DESC 
LIMIT 1;
